dc_title_s: Peregrinationis divi Pauli typus corographicus : in quo et noui testamenti, in primis autem apostolorum historiae, à sancto Luca descriptae, omnia ferè loca geographica, oculis inspicienda, exhibantur
dc_description_s: Map of Mediterranean Region, showing route of St. Paul's sea voyages; relief shown pictorially. Includes 2 scenes from the life of St. Paul above map. In lower right corner: Cum priuilegio Imp. et Regie̦ Maiestatis. French text on verso, headed: Peregrination de S. Paul. From: Theatre de l'vnivers, contenant les cartes de tout le monde ... / par Abraham Ortelius ... [A Anvers : De l'Imprimerie de Christofle Plantin, pour Abraham Ortel ... ], 1587.
